meanings.definition: A person who breeds or keeps rabbits.
meanings.sent1: The warreners in our neighborhood have many cute rabbits.
meanings.sent2: The warreners take good care of their fluffy bunnies.
meanings.sent3: The warreners organized a bunny race for fun.
meanings.sent4: The warreners' rabbit collection multiplied like magic.
meanings.sent5: The warreners' love for rabbits shines brightly.

meanings.definition: A group of people who work together to breed or keep rabbits.
meanings.sent1: The warreners meet every weekend to discuss rabbit breeding.
meanings.sent2: The warreners share tips and tricks for raising rabbits.
meanings.sent3: The warreners planned a rabbit-themed party for their next meeting.
meanings.sent4: The warreners' teamwork in rabbit care is impressive.
meanings.sent5: The warreners' rabbit community thrives with cooperation.
